questions.q: Which keyword is used to prevent method overriding?
What is the primary purpose of the 'finally' block in a try-catch-finally construct?
options: To execute code only when an exception occurs.
To execute code regardless of whether an exception occurs or not.
To define the end of the exception handler.
questions.answer: To execute code regardless of whether an exception occurs or not.

questions.q: Which Python library is commonly used for data manipulation and analysis, primarily using DataFrames?
In Python, which built-in function is used to create an anonymous (lambda) function?
Which constraint ensures that all values in a column are unique?
What is normalization in a relational database?
options: Removing all data from a table.
Organizing data to reduce redundancy and inconsistency.
Creating a view of the data.
Increasing the speed of SELECT queries.
questions.answer: Organizing data to reduce redundancy and inconsistency.

questions.q: Which schema is typically used for defining the structure of a Data Warehouse?
In Data Mining, what technique is used to find items that occur together frequently?
Which component in Hadoop is responsible for storing the data across the cluster?
What is the main advantage of Apache Spark over Hadoop MapReduce?
options: It uses disk storage for all intermediate operations.
It is a simpler file system.
